info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS ENTERING WESTERN MASSACHUSETTS... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms entering Berkshire County, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Heath and Rowe around 605 PM EDT. Colrain around 615 PM EDT. Leyden around 625 PM EDT. Greenfield and Bernardston around 630 PM EDT. Gill around 635 PM EDT. Northfield, Chester, Blandford and Middlefield around 645 PM EDT. Orange and Huntington around 700 PM EDT. Montgomery around 705 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for western and central Massachusetts.
